question: Which country's professional sports club is "Accra Hearts of Oak Sporting Club"?
explanation: Accra Hearts of Oak Sporting Club is a professional sports club based in Accra (Greater Accra), Ghana. The club competes in the Ghana Premier League, the Premier Division on the Ghanaian football pyramid. Hearts of Oak was also ranked 8th football club in the world in the year 2000 when the club dominated most of the continent sporting activities.
